snippet.title: SCP-087-B (aka hallways)
snippet.description:
http://www.scpcbgame.com/scp-087-b.html

A clip from a small game SCP-087-B I made using Blitz3D. The events on each floor are placed somewhat randomly and the layout of the building changes a bit every time. 

Video quality is horrible because my screen recorder sucks, but download it and see it for yourself.

The game was inspired by http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uiHQN1q8ln4 and http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-087
